name: Down The River (itch)
description:
A kayak-survival game prototype. Started during LOWREZJAM 2017, continued development to add additional polish

Controls:
left + right keys = forward AND rotate,
shift + direction key = reverse AND rotate,

or alternatively,
A+D = forward AND rotate,
Q+E = reverse AND rotate

Tips:
Try to paddle the majority of the stroke for full POWER; tiny strokes will rotate the kayak without increasing speed.
You can use the reverse paddle stroke to slow down (or even paddle backwards).
